00033 using namespace Hyperspace;

00039 void RequestHandlerRenewSession::run() {
00040 
00041   int error;
00042 
00043   try {
00044     SessionDataPtr session_ptr;
00045 
00046     if (m_shutdown) {
00047       m_master->destroy_session(m_session_id);
00048       return;
00049     }
00050 
00051     if (m_session_id == 0) {
00052       m_session_id = m_master->create_session(m_event->addr);
00053       HT_INFOF("Session handle %llu created", (Llu)m_session_id);
00054       error = Error::OK;
00055     }
00056     else
00057       error = m_master->renew_session_lease(m_session_id);
00058 
00059     if (error == Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION) {
00060       HT_INFOF("Session handle %llu expired", (Llu)m_session_id);
00061       CommBufPtr cbp(Protocol::create_server_keepalive_request(m_session_id,
00062                      Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION));
00063       error = m_comm->send_datagram(m_event->addr, *m_send_addr, cbp);
00064       if (error != Error::OK) {
00065         HT_ERRORF("Comm::send_datagram returned %s",
00066                   Error::get_text(error));
00067       }
00068       return;
00069     }
00070 
00071     if (!m_master->get_session(m_session_id, session_ptr)) {
00072       HT_ERRORF("Unable to find data for session %llu", (Llu)m_session_id);
00073       return;
00074     }
00075 
00076     session_ptr->purge_notifications(m_last_known_event);
00077 
00083     CommBufPtr cbp(Protocol::create_server_keepalive_request(
00084                    session_ptr));
00085     error = m_comm->send_datagram(m_event->addr, *m_send_addr, cbp);
00086     if (error != Error::OK) {
00087       HT_ERRORF("Comm::send_datagram returned %s",
00088                 Error::get_text(error));
00089     }
00090 
00091   }
00092   catch (Exception &e) {
00093     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00094   }
00095 }
